import React, { useState } from 'react' import sampleIcon from '../../assets/images/default.png' import AdminCategory from './AdminCategory'; import AdminCustomCompany from './AdminCustomCompany'; // import Category from '../user/categories/Category' const openModal = () => { let modal = document.getElementsByClassName('modal')[0]; modal.style.display = 'block'; } const AdminItem = () => { const [categoryStatus, setCategoryStatus] = useState('active') const [type, setType] = useState('full time'); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const closeModal = () => { let modal = document.getElementsByClassName('modal')[0]; modal.style.display = 'none'; } return ( <>
) } export default AdminItem
